file_test.comment: Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml exists and has permissions rw------- and more restrictive
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml exists and is owned by root:root
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-controller-manager.yaml exists and has permissions rw-r--r-- and does not have permissions --x-wx-wx
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-controller-manager.yaml exists and is owned by 0:0
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-scheduler.yaml exists and has permissions rw-r--r-- and does not have permissions --x-wx-wx
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-scheduler.yaml exists and is owned by 0:0
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/etcd.yaml exists and has permissions rw------- or more restrictive
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/etcd.yaml exists and is owned by 0:0 and has permissions rw-r--r-- and does not have permissions --x-wx-wx
Ensure at least one file named /var/lib/etcd exists and has permissions rwx------ and does not have permissions ---rwxrwx
Ensure at least one file named /var/lib/etcd exists and is owned by 420:0
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/admin.conf exists and has permissions rw------- and does not have permissions ---rwxrwx-wx
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/admin.conf exists and is owned by 0:0
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/scheduler.conf exists and has permissions rw------- or more restrictive
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/scheduler.conf exists and is owned by 0:0
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/controller-manager.conf exists and has permissions rw------- or more restrictive
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/controller-manager.conf exists and is owned by 0:0
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/pki/ exists and is owned by 0:0

textfilecontent54_test.comment: Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml exists and does not match pattern ^.*--token-auth-file=.*$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml exists and matches pattern ^.*--kubelet-client-key=.+$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml exists and matches pattern ^.*--kubelet-client-certificate=.+$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml exists and matches pattern ^.*--kubelet-certificate-authority=.+$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml exists and matches pattern ^.*--authorization-mode=.*RBAC$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml exists and matches pattern ^.*--authorization-mode=Node,RBAC$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml exists and matches pattern ^.*--authorization-mode=Node,RBAC$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml exists and does not match pattern ^.*--enable-admission-plugins=AlwaysAdmit$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml exists and does not match pattern ^.*--disable-admission-plugins=.+ServiceAccount.+$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml exists and matches pattern ^.*--disable-admission-plugins=.+NamespaceLifecycle.+$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml exists and matches pattern ^.*--enable-admission-plugins=.+,NodeRestriction.+$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml exists and matches pattern ^.*--profiling=false$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml exists and matches pattern ^.*--audit-log-path=\/var\/log\/apiserver\/audit\.log$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml exists and matches pattern ^.*--audit-log-maxage=30$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml exists and matches pattern ^.*--audit-log-maxbackup=10$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml exists and matches pattern ^.*--audit-log-maxsize=100$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml exists and matches pattern ^.*--service-account-lookup=true$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml exists and matches pattern ^.*--service-account-key-file.+$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml exists and matches pattern ^.*--etcd-keyfile=.+$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml exists and matches pattern ^.*--etcd-certfile=.+$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml exists and matches pattern ^.*--tls-private-key-file=.+$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml exists and matches pattern ^.*--tls-cert-file=.+$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml exists and matches pattern ^.*--client-ca-file=.+$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml exists and matches pattern ^.*--etcd-cafile=.+$
Ensure that the --service-account-extend-token-expiration parameter is set to false in kube-apiserver.yaml
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-controller-manager.yaml exists and matches pattern ^.*--profiling=false$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-controller-manager.yaml exists and matches pattern ^.*--use-service-account-credentials=true$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-controller-manager.yaml exists and matches pattern ^.*--service-account-private-key-file=.+$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-controller-manager.yaml exists and matches pattern ^.*--root-ca-file=.+$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-controller-manager.yaml exists and matches pattern ^.*--feature-gates=RotateKubeletServerCertificate=true$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-controller-manager.yaml exists and matches pattern ^.*--address=127.0.0.1$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-scheduler.yaml exists and matches pattern ^.*--profiling=false$
Ensure at least one file named /etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-scheduler.yaml exists and matches pattern ^.*--address=127.0.0.1$

Ensure that the --rotate-certificates argument is set to true
